eu.opends.analyzer

Class DeviationComputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.analyzer.DeviationComputer

  • public class DeviationComputer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class computes the deviation of a car's driven track from a given ideal line. Both (track and ideal line) are considered as set of two-dimensional points.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DeviationComputer(java.util.ArrayList<com.jme3.math.Vector3f> wayPoints)
      Creates a new deviation computer

      This method returns all ideal lines
      java.util.List<com.jme3.math.Vector3f> getWayPoints()
      Returns the list of all given way points as 3-dimensional vectors
      void showAllWayPoints()
      Writes all given way points to the console
